I'm in good company then, I'm listening to John Denver at the mo......borin=
g to some but .........i've never really had friends that fit into my stran=
ge intersts and let alone music.....my main focus is on ...stay tuned  LOL
=

riginal Message ----- 
  From: Frank Sumption 
  To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.c=
om 
  Sent: Wednesday, November 07, 2007 1:48 AM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] N=
othin'!


  Welcome Sharon! Personally, I didn't need the proof either, I c=
ould already sense, and sometimes see spirits, and other junk, I'm just int=
rigued with EVP, and ITC. 
   
   Frank





------------------------------=
----------------------------------------------
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.=
com
    From: sfe74275@...
    Date: Wed, 7 Nov 2007 00:46:30 +1=
000
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Nothin'!


    Hi,

    I am a newcomer...bu=
t not to the paranormal..I've been hooked as long as I can remember, from f=
eelings of dejavu, to insisting to my parents that I "saw" their wedding, I=
 now believe i saw this from spirit realms (my mom was pregnant with me)...=
.it felt as though I was watching thier union from an ex emplorary view poi=
nt (like on widescrean HD, which did not exist in 1968), I often asked abou=
t their "movie" to answers of : I dreamt it etc....but I still remember bei=
ng child like and asking parent like beings: is that my parents?? I don't r=
emeber a reply in words just an "undersatnding" ...hence lots more has happ=
ened, and to cut a long story short my interest in EVP and proof that we ex=
ist before birth and after death......

    Sharron (Australia)  
      ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
      From: Frank Ratka 
      To: EVP-ITC@yahoo=
groups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, November 06, 2007 11:42 PM
      Subject: =
Re: [EVP-ITC] Nothin'!



      Your right Frank, it all depends on expecta=
tions and what degree of proof it will take for someone to accept the exist=
ence of the beyond and the entities who reside there. People all over the w=
orld scream for proof but yet if you ask them they cannot define what crite=
ria they require for proof. Why? Because they are so brainwashed in our soc=
ieties materialistic teachings they never expect to receive proof, so they =
don't even bother to define such a criteria.

      Its amazing to me that =
a primarily spiritual creature such as ourselves can deny our connections w=
ith that world and the source. The connections we experience everyday and a=
t all times in the form of dreams, random thoughts and inspirations are so =
easily taken for granted and written off as figments of imagination, trivia=
l thoughts and meaningless aspirations. Even as a child I knew I was unique=
 as was every person on the face of the planet. I knew that their were as m=
any perspectives of reality as their were people to have them and that each=
 and every one of them were just as valid as the other no matter how outlan=
dish it seemed to me.

      Acceptance was taught to me instead of beliefs=
. Beliefs can enhance the truth but they are not in themselves true.

     =
 More than I expected to write but I feel it is still valid,

      Best re=
gards,

      Frank R.


      ----- Original Message ----
      From: Fran=
k Sumption <franks-boxes@...>
      To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com
   =
   Sent: Monday, November 5, 2007 1:03:02 PM
      Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] N=
othin'!


       I'm not really discouraged except by other people's expect=
ation, and use of the box. It is all about learning, I don't think we're su=
pposed, or can, get the proof on this level. I think in my next life I'm go=
ing to take journalism, cuz I certainly can't communicate what my thoughts =
are. 
       
       Frank-S





        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
    =
    From: bulletbabea@ yahoo.com
        Date: Mon, 5 Nov 2007 10:05:15 -08=
00
        Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Nothin'!


        I was too tired to pos=
t but I listened to those files last night. I heard the first eq file same =
as you except one word...monday i heard as tuesday. When you got into slowi=
ng it down etc that brought up different multilayers within so I heard some=
 other stuff.

        I know how hard it is for you sometimes with what th=
e guys send ya. Thats why ya just have to take it as a grain of salt and us=
e it as a learning experience rather than some profound truth being said al=
l the time.

        I dont let any of it discourage me, it all interests m=
e instead. I dont get as much deception, but its happened in the past and u=
sually the others are quick to point out the deciever and remove them.

   =
     Misty


        Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@ hotmail.com> wrote:
    =
      This is what troubles me, I get these supposed Earthquake predictions=
, the last one fairly specific, and --nothin'! It was supposed to be for Ch=
ina, today. That's what I try to get across, you can't take this shit like =
it's written in stone, or some kind of friggin' gospel, as most seem prone =
to do. So far, irregardless of how clear the voice is, or what method is us=
ed, the only thing that can be said with certainty is that they consistentl=
y lie! Personally I seem to get just enough "truth" to keep me hooked. I do=
n't think you can say with any certainty it's sprits of the deceased, at le=
ast not all of it, there's that level of deception that I don't kow what do=
 to with. When someone tells me they have the knowledge to know what questi=
ons to ask to verify the personality, I have to conclude they are absolutel=
y clueless. I don't care how many books they've written, or how many "unive=
rsities" they've given. When something knows how you think, what you are pe=
rceiving, and how it's being perceived, you can't prevent yourself from bei=
ng deceived, or more like played with. I know I'll be deceived, and tricked=
, and I tell them have fun with that, cuz I don't really care. I'm not afte=
r any particular spirit, or piece of knowledge.  
           
           Wh=
en these voices tell someone not to share the information, that's even thin=
ner ice to on!
           
           I still, everyday, question the value=
 of this work, and if it warrents continuing. I can do this on my own, but =
I don't want to drag the unitiated into hell with me! I find the communicat=
ion mode itself facsinating, and don't expect that profound paranormal know=
ledge others seem to seek. I don't care who is talking through the box.  I =
think those seeking those bits of profound knowledge, or secrets will get l=
ead right down the rabbit hole. 
           
           Frank-S
